rows.label: tlk43400044_03_msg0001
rows.name:
You lot need to get yourself off
and help Ion.

rows.label: tlk43400044_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Still not feeling up to scratch? Well,
you'd be better off getting some rest...

rows.label: tlk43400044_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Once you're up to it, get out there and
help Ion out sharpish!

rows.label: tlk43400044_03_msg0004
rows.name:
The Karam Ruins are at the very top
of the Holy Gate of Fontana.

rows.label: tlk43400044_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Hey! This is a business.
I can't let you stay for free. Sorry...
